rules_text: This creature gets +2/+2 and has trample as long as it’s merged with another card or token.
special_text:
Gestalt [i](When this or another creature you control enters, you may merge it with the one in play, keeping counters and attachments. They become the permanent on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
This creature gets +2/+2 and has trample as long as it’s merged with another card or token.
